attributes.action: Allow children's soft play to open
attributes.additional_details: Children have missed out on enough this year. They need some sort of normality reinstating and by constantly changing the rules for them and moving the goal posts we are causing mental health issues for the future. We need to have strong emotional stable children as without this we will have damaged adults that will be a lot harder to fix. Children’s services need to be consistent. This includes maternity services as children should be aware of both parents being there from the womb.
attributes.background: Children have missed out on so much this year, they have no sense of stability. This will have a detrimental effect on their mental health. They need a voice and we need to be it. Open up soft play and let the other parent attend all maternity appointments.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555523
